name: UNWANTED POWER (S): Treant Rampage
description:
Have fun with our top-down, hack n‘ slash game! This tree couldn‘t take it no more. Equipped with his significant boxing gloves, he went on a fight against his most unwanted power - the evil generators.

Falling leaves? We are sorry, you lost some of your life. Make sure to sip some water by walking over a puddle.
Wanna get rid of the generators? Punch them until they explode. 
What is that smoke for? Just make sure that you don‘t touch it. 

Treant Rampage was developed in the context of an 48h Game Jam at the University in Oldenburg. The motto was: ‚Unwanted Powers‘.

Controls: 
WASD or arrow keys - moving
Space bar - punch

Music: Niklas Wenning
Sound: Roman Majewski
Programming: Roman Majewski, Dennis Diekmann
Graphic design: Marit Ziebur, Kristina Wassiljew
Animations: Kristina Wassiljew
